task.title: Using SLCmd at the Command Line Interface (CLI)

taskbody.context: Command Line Interface (CLI)Using SLCmd at CLIAdministrators can work with TXOne directly from the command line interface (CLI) using the SLCmd.exe program.

step.cmd: Open a command prompt window with Windows administrator privileges.
Navigate to the TXOne installation folder using the cd command.

stepxmp.p: For example, type the following command to reach the default location:

step.cmd: Type SLCmd.exe -h to get usage information for an individual command.
